fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack both living neighbours of a Striked player.
- Once per game, attack all four living neighbours of a Strike player. However, if one of them would survive your attack, you perform a regular attack, consuming this ability.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may place as many Strikes are you like on top of doing your nightly action.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain basic defence.
